searchHistory.Title: Barbie in the Nutcracker
searchHistory.Writer: Linda Engelsiepen, Hilary Hinkle, Rob Hudnut, E.T.A. Hoffmann (story), Ruth Handler (characters)
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Kirby Morrow, Tim Curry, Peter Kelamis
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie (Kelly Sheridan) shows that if you are kind, clever and brave, anything is possible in this tale of Clara (Kelly Sheridan) and her amazing Nutcracker (Kirby Morrow), who set off on an adventure to find the Sugarplum Princess.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie
searchHistory.Actors: Margot Robbie, Ryan Gosling, Issa Rae
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie of Swan Lake
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Mark Hildreth, Kelsey Grammer, Maggie Wheeler
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie comes to life in her third animated movie, based on the beloved fairy tale and set to the brilliant music of Tchaikovsky.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie as The Princess and the Pauper
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Melissa Lyons, Julie Stevens, Mark Hildreth
searchHistory.Plot: Inspired by Mark Twain's fascinating novel, Princess Anneliese finds an unexpected friendship when she meets her humble look-alike, Erika. Will the Princess and the Pauper thwart the plans of the Queen's scheming advisor, Preminger?

searchHistory.Title: Barbie as Rapunzel
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Anjelica Huston, Cree Summer, Ian James Corlett
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie is an artist who paints her way out of a castle to save her prince.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie in the 12 Dancing Princesses
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Catherine O'Hara, Nicole Oliver, Jennifer Copping
searchHistory.Plot: The widowed King Randolph enlists the help of his cousin to teach his daughters the proper royal etiquette. Instead, she bans all dancing in the palace. Can the twelve dancing princesses save the kingdom with their late mother's gift?

searchHistory.Title: Barbie: Fairytopia
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Lee Tockar, Tabitha St. Germain, Kathleen Barr
searchHistory.Plot: In Fairytopia's Magic Meadow, the beautiful sprite, Elina, longs for a sparkling set of wings. When the evil Laverna weakens all flying creatures, Elina must find the Guardian Fairy, Azura. Can a single little fairy thwart Laverna's plans?

searchHistory.Title: Barbie and the Magic of Pegasus 3-D
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Kathleen Barr, Lalainia Lindbjerg, Colin Murdock
searchHistory.Plot: An unfortunate incident with a powerful warlock sends the teenage Princess Annika on a mission to the magnificent Cloud Kingdom with her new friend: the wonderful flying-horse, Brietta. Will she break the wizard's spell to save her family?

searchHistory.Title: Barbie: Life in the Dreamhouse
searchHistory.Actors: Kate Higgins, Sean Hankinson, Haviland Stillwell
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie has various misadventures with her friends and sisters in a doll-sized version of Malibu.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie: The Princess & the Popstar
searchHistory.Writer: Steve Granat, Cydne Clark, Ruth Handler
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Jennifer Waris, Ashleigh Ball
searchHistory.Plot: When the gracious young Princess, Tori, trades places with her favourite singer, Keira, the girls will have to work together to save the realm of Meribella. Will the Princess and the Pop Star learn to appreciate the power of uniqu...

searchHistory.Title: Barbie as the Island Princess
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Melissa Lyons, Alessandro Juliani, Christopher Gaze
searchHistory.Plot: Marooned on an idyllic islet, the beautiful young woman, Ro, sees her world turn upside down, when an adventurous prince takes her and her furry friends to explore civilisation. Could Ro be Rosella, the missing Island Princess?

searchHistory.Title: Barbie Fairytopia: Mermaidia
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Lee Tockar, Christopher Gaze, Kathleen Barr
searchHistory.Plot: In this animated follow-up to Fairytopia, Elina (played by Barbie) enlists the help of a mermaid, Nori, to save her friend Nalu, a merman prince who has been captured by the wicked Laverna.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie in the Pink Shoes
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Katie Crown, Ali Liebert
searchHistory.Plot: About a young girl who finds a pair of pink ballet shoes and is taken to a magical ballet land.There she learns how to help her friends and follow her instincts.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie and the Diamond Castle
searchHistory.Writer: Ruth Handler (based on: the Barbie characters created by), Elana Lesser (screenwriter), Cliff Ruby (screenwriter)
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Melissa Lyons, Cassidy Ladden, Chantal Strand
searchHistory.Plot: Two best friends, Liana and Alexa, embark on a journey to find the Diamond Castle! With the help of music, the girls overcome challenges that show friendship is the true treasure.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie and the Three Musketeers
searchHistory.Writer: Ruth Handler (based on: the Barbie characters created by), Amy Wolfram
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Tim Curry, Kira Tozer, Willow Johnson
searchHistory.Plot: It's "all for one and one for all" in this action-filled adventure as Barbie stars as Corinne (Kelly Sheridan), a young country girl headed to Paris to pursue her big dream - to become a Musketeer.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie in a Mermaid Tale
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Kathleen Barr, Tabitha St. Germain, Peter Mel
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie stars as Merliah, a surfer who learns a shocking secret: she's a mermaid! She and her dolphin friend set out for an undersea adventure to rescue her mother, the queen of Oceana.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie: Princess Charm School
searchHistory.Actors: Diana Kaarina, Morwenna Banks, Nicole Oliver, Brittney Wilson
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie stars as Blair, a kind-hearted girl who is chosen to attend Princess Charm School. In this magical place, she makes new friends and discovers that there's a princess in every girl!

searchHistory.Title: Barbie and the Secret Door
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Brittany McDonald, Ashleigh Ball
searchHistory.Plot: Alexa is a very shy princess from a contemporary, modern kingdom who discovers a secret door that opens to a magical land.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie in 'A Christmas Carol'
searchHistory.Writer: Elise Allen, Charles Dickens (based on the story by), Ruth Handler (based on: the Barbie characters created by)
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Morwenna Banks, Melissa Lyons, Prudence Edwards
searchHistory.Plot: Barbie stars in her first holiday movie in this heart-warming adaptation of the classic Dickens story filled with cherished Christmas carols, fabulous fashions and lots of laughs!

searchHistory.Title: Barbie Mariposa and Her Butterfly Fairy Friends
searchHistory.Writer: Elise Allen, Ruth Handler (based on: the Barbie characters created by)
searchHistory.Actors: Chiara Zanni, Tabitha St. Germain, Kathleen Barr, Erin Mathews
searchHistory.Plot: Join Barbie in an all-new world of Butterfly Fairies! When the Queen falls ill, it's up to brave Mariposa and her friends to journey beyond the safe borders of the city to find a cure.

searchHistory.Title: Barbie as the Island Princess
searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Melissa Lyons, Alessandro Juliani, Christopher Gaze
searchHistory.Plot: Marooned on an idyllic islet, the beautiful young woman, Ro, sees her world turn upside down, when an adventurous prince takes her and her furry friends to explore civilisation. Could Ro be Rosella, the missing Island Princess?

searchHistory.Actors: Kelly Sheridan, Lee Tockar, Christopher Gaze, Kathleen Barr
searchHistory.Plot: In this animated follow-up to Fairytopia, Elina (played by Barbie) enlists the help of a mermaid, Nori, to save her friend Nalu, a merman prince who has been captured by the wicked Laverna.
